titleStmt.title: A description of an annuall world, or, Briefe meditiations upon all the holy-daies in the yeere with certaine briefe poeticall meditations of the day in generall and all the daies in the weeke / by E.B.
titleStmt.author: Browne, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.B. for William Ley ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Edward Browne. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Fully described in Grolier club cat. of early works of English writers from Wither to Pryor, New York, 1905, v. 1, no. 103, p. 96-97 & facsimile facing p. 184.
